relation: They offer all kinds of activities. Many days there will be neat activities in the lunch room such as; wax hands or skins for your computer!
The dining room is very nice, clean, and modern. It's just right and not too crowded. There is also a great choice of food.
They have a great living system. Freshman live in dorms and then as you progress in class rank, you can progress up to appartments at no extra charge!!!
Do all homework and go to class. If you do that, you'll do great!
Mount Olive College is a wonderful school. They have great teachers who really know what their teaching and great facilities. It is a beautiful campus and a wonderful place to learn.
pageTitle: University of Mount Olive Reviews: Student Reviews and Ratings | Cappex
TableContextTimeStampAfterTable: {50380=Mount Olive have a special tradition that they do for Christmas, relay for life, The church and Chaplin is doing things every week, and the month of April is Mount Olive Pickle Festival. textAfterTable: Login to rate or flag the reviews Joshua from Goldsboro, NC 07/05/2012 Reviewer is A current student here. 2 out of 3 people found this review useful. 2 of 22 Categories Comments Campus Safety Very safe college. Clubs and Activities There are many. What to do for fun Chill with friends and go to beach. Dorm Life It is pretty cool because there are plent of pople to meet. Tips for prospective students It is a great school and do ur best no matter where u attend. In three sentences Mount Olive is a wonderful school. It based on the christian faithbut welcome all religions to be apart of it. It has a great staff ho ctually cae bout u.
